data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: I was very naughty when I was a child. One night when I was about 7 years old, I went with my mum to her friend's house. Her friend prepared many desserts to welcome me and my mum. I started with one cake and after I finished the second slice, my mum tried to stop me but it did not work. I was being naughty and trying to eat all the cakes on the table. I ended up in hospital that night and regretted having too many desserts.
data.referenceText: Describe a naughty thing you did when you were a child. How old were you and did you get in trouble?
data.referenceTranslate: 描述你小时候做的一件淘气的事，你多大了? 你遇到过麻烦吗?
